thread.title: Richard Vanderstraten
thread.title_full: MOTORCYCLE SHIPPERS reviewed by Richard Vanderstraten

author: Richard Vanderstraten
title: Richard Vanderstraten
text:
This was the first time I've used this service after many years of buying motorcycles. This move was well planned, easy to track, cost competitive and easy!
I have recommended your services to others already, thanks again for your professional services.
